summary: This replaces the main menu theme with the Skyrim theme(Swanson remix) one.
descriptionHtml:
This replaces the main menu theme with the Skyrim theme(Swanson remix) one.
This remix is used in the ''Make dance not war'' video.
All credits for the goes to Swanson Sounds!
All credits for the video goes to Machinima!
https://soundcloud.com/swanson-sounds/skyrim-theme-swanson-remix
You can download the MP3 here!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6yCaw22yi30
This is the video made by Machinima!

I only converted the MP3 to XWM.
author: nitroman7
